name: Universal Keyboard Case for 9-11 Inch Tablets, Dual Bluetooth Detachable Keyboard for Android Tablets/iPads/Galaxy Tabs, Magnetic Backlit Keyboard with Washable Adhesive Mount&Any-Angle Stand&Trackpad
short_description: Keyboard Case for Your "Unsupported" Tablet: Fits 9-11 inch tablets EXCLUSIVELY with top-left cameras (NOT center-positioned). Secure attachment via residue-free adhesive pads that leave zero damage on devices and works on ANY tablets - solve compatibility struggles forever!

Revolutionary Washable & Reusable Adhesive: Features water-washable adhesive pads that restore stickiness when rinsed. Simply detach the case (keyboard remains dry), wash dust off the pad, air-dry, and reuse. Includes 4 EXTRA adhesive pads for long-term use.
Connect 2 Devices: Seamless switching between 2 Bluetooth devices (iOS/Android/Windows) with single-tap transitions (Fn+"1"/ "2").
7-Color Backlit & Precised Trackpad: Enjoy 7 RGB colors & 3 brightness levels in low-light environments. Integrated multi-touch touchpad supports gestures like scroll/swipe.
Multi-Angle Adjustable Stand: Detachable keyboard with strong magnetic snap-on for flexible typing positions. The any-angle stand helps you different stands for typing, viewing, or drawing.
Hassle-Free Maintenance: Keyboard detaches instantly for cleaning or solo tablet use. Adhesive pads allow tool-free tablet swaps. Note: Only the case is washable - keyboard is not submersible.

name: YBING for iPad A16 Case with Keyboard 11th &10th Generation, 360 Rotation Magnetic Cover with 7-Color Backlit Wireless Detachable Keypad with Pencil Holder for iPad 11th 2025/10 Gen 10.9" 2022 (Pink)
short_description: 【Only Compatible 2 iPad Models】This for iPad 11th/10th generation case with keyboard only can be compatible iPad 11th Generation 2025(Model Number:A3354/A3355/A3356),and for iPad 10th Generation 2022(Model Number:A2696/A2757/A2777/A3162). Please check the model number starting with "AXXXX" on the back of your iPad before purchasing. (This product does not include: Tablets & Pencils!)

【7 Colors Rainbow Backlight Keyboard】The RGB rainbow backlight keyboard for iPad A16 11th generation can provide you with a typing experience in the dark, and the backlight has 7 adjustable colors. These colors can be automatically switched in breathing light mode, and the brightness of the keyboard can be adjusted by pressing Fn+light key. When you don't need the backlight, you can turn it off.

【Long-Lasting Battery Life Rechargeable Keyboard】This for iPad a16 keyboard case has a built-in 420 mAh lithium battery, which charges for 2-3 hours and can work continuously for up to 60+ hours under normal use,which will automatically enter sleep mode when not used for a long time to save power, and click any key to instantly the wake-up.Standby state lasts up to 150+ days,which is very friendly for travel and mobile office.

【360° Rotatable Strong Magnetic Adsorption】This protective for ipad 11th generation keyboard case is made of premium PU leather and has 16 built-in powerful magnets, which can firmly absorb the keyboard to prevent the keyboard from moving and falling.The back cover can be rotated 360 degrees, The tablet can be placed horizontally or vertically, or it can be detached for use, allowing you to watch videos or read at a comfortable angle.

【Multi-Angle Adjustment & Protection】The protective for ipad A16 keyboard case has 3 anti-slip grooves and supports multiple angles, allowing you to use the tablet at a comfortable tilt angle and enjoy reading, drawing, watching, chatting, etc. The magnetic buckle can bring solid full-body protection to your iPad, which can effectively prevent scratches caused by accidental falls, dust or any other daily damage.

【Auto Sleep & Wake Function】The Magic keyboard for ipad 11th and 10th gen will wake up when the case is opened and will go to sleep when it is closed. To achieve the perfect effect of sleep wake-up, please remove the Wireless Bluetooth Keyboard, because the keyboard with iron will prevent the mutual attraction between the magnets. NOTE: When using the keyboard,please adjust to the same system as the device afterconnecting Bluetooth.
